text: Ram Jeevan Singh is an Indian politician. He was elected to the Lok Sabha, the lower house of the Parliament of India from the Balia in Bihar as a member of the Janata Dal (United). ==References== ==External links== *Official biographical sketch in Parliament of India website Category:Janata Dal (United) politicians Category:6th Lok Sabha members Category:13th Lok Sabha members Category:Janata Dal politicians Category:Janata Party politicians Category:Lok Sabha members from Bihar Category:1932 births Category:Living people Category:Bihar MLAs 1967–1969 Category:Bihar MLAs 1969–1972 Category:Bihar MLAs 1972–1977 Category:Bihar MLAs 1990–1995 Category:Bihar MLAs 1995–2000
title: Ram Jeevan Singh
